channel.title: CVE Feed for Škoda Auto -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Škoda Auto -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28900|2024-08-02T13:51:39.125Z -- %C5%A1koda%20auto -- %C5%A1koda%20connect
item.description: The Skoda Automotive cloud contains a Broken Access Control vulnerability, allowing to obtain nicknames and other user identifiers of Skoda Connect service users by specifying an arbitrary vehicle VIN number.
